# Web On Dev - LLM Context File
# https://www.webondev.com

> Web On Dev is a professional software development company founded in 2015, serving clients worldwide.

## Quick Facts
- Founded: 2015
- Headquarters: Lahore, Pakistan
- Team: 50+ professionals
- Projects: 500+ completed
- Rating: 4.9/5 stars
- Service Areas: 50+ countries worldwide

## Services & Pricing

### Web Development ($3,000 - $100,000+)
Next.js, React, Vue.js, Angular, WordPress, Shopify, custom web applications

### Mobile Apps ($10,000 - $150,000+)
iOS (Swift), Android (Kotlin), React Native, Flutter cross-platform development

### UI/UX Design ($2,000 - $25,000+)
User research, wireframing, prototyping, design systems, WCAG accessibility

### Digital Marketing ($500 - $10,000/month)
SEO, PPC advertising, social media, content marketing, email campaigns

### E-commerce ($5,000 - $75,000+)
Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, custom marketplace platforms

### Cloud & DevOps (Custom pricing)
AWS, Azure, GCP, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, infrastructure automation

## Technology Stack
Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vue.js
Backend: Node.js, Python, PHP, Go, Java
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis
Cloud: AWS, Vercel, Google Cloud, Azure

## Contact
- Website: https://www.webondev.com

## Free Services
- Initial consultation (30-60 minutes)
- Project estimation
- Technical feasibility analysis

## FAQs

Q: What is the typical project timeline?
A: 2-4 weeks for simple websites, 4-8 weeks for business sites, 8-16+ weeks for complex applications.

Q: Do you work with international clients?
A: Yes, we serve clients in USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, UAE, India, and 50+ other countries.

Q: What payment terms do you offer?
A: 30% upfront, 40% at milestones, 30% upon completion. Monthly retainers available.

Q: Do you sign NDAs?
A: Yes, we routinely sign NDAs and prioritize client confidentiality.
